blogPost.excerpt: Find the perfect time across multiple time zones. We have our coworkers, family and friends distributed across the globe. Knowing what time overlaps can get tricky. We created Nomad Time to have a simple, fast and delightful experience.
blogPost.body: Find the perfect time across multiple time zones. We have our coworkers, family and friends distributed across the globe. Knowing what time overlaps can get tricky. We created Nomad Time to have a simple, fast and delightful experience.
blogPost.title: Nomad Time - A friendly time zone converter
blogPost.author: Rafael Chiti

localize.description: 跨越多个时区寻找完美时间。我们的同事、家人和朋友分布在全球各地。知道什么时间重叠可能会变得很棘手。我们创建了Nomad Time，以获得简单、快速和愉悦的体验。
localize.tagline: 一个友好的时区转换器

localize.description: 跨越多個時區尋找完美時間。我們的同事、家人和朋友分佈在全球各地。知道什麼時間重疊可能會變得很棘手。我們創建了Nomad Time，以獲得簡單、快速和愉悅的體驗。
localize.tagline: 一個友好的時區轉換器
